select nextval('kvbatch_history_id')
insert into kvbatch_history (id, batch_id, number_of_records_updated, updated_date, time_taken,time_taken_in_sec, data_source, status) values (#{id}, #{batch_id}, #{number_of_records_updated}, DATE_TRUNC('second', NOW()), #{time_taken}, #{time_taken_in_sec},#{data_source}, #{status})
mapper.sql: select id, batch_id, TO_CHAR(number_of_records_updated, '999,999') as records, TO_CHAR(updated_date, 'DD Month YYYY "@" HH24:MI:SS') as updatedDate, TO_CHAR(time_taken, '999,999') as timeTaken, TO_CHAR(time_taken_in_sec, '999,999') as timeTakenInSec, data_source, status from kvbatch_history where batch_id = #{batch_id} order by id desc

SELECT row_number() over(order by hist.updated_date desc) as rowNum, batch.name as batchName, batch.description as batchDesc, TO_CHAR(hist.number_of_records_updated, '999,999') as records, TO_CHAR(hist.time_taken_in_sec, '999,999') as timeTakenInSec, TO_CHAR(hist.updated_date, 'DD Month YYYY "@" HH24:MI:SS') as updatedDate, hist.status as status FROM kvbatch as batch INNER JOIN kvbatch_history hist ON batch.id = hist.batch_id
